title: ATF Type Designer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730211153/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730211153/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools): [Type Design Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730211153/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Design%20Tools) : ATF Type Designer**

ATF Type Designer is a font editing program now only of historical interest. A special feature was an attempt to implement [Optical Scaling](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730211153/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Optical%20Scaling) in software, but it certainly did not catch on.

More information can be found in this [Seybold review](http://web.archive.org/web/20140730211153/http:/www.seyboldreports.com/SRDP/dp6/dp06-06a.htm).
author: paul d hunt
